text: Has anyone implemented a dynamic page using the HubDB table dynamic page setup yet? (as outlined here: <http://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tutorials/how-to-build-dynamic-pages-with-hubdb>)

I’m wondering if you can chain them (i.e. use the first HubDB table as a set of keys for other tables to use in the pages referenced by the top-level page — the one using the Dynamic table in the first place)

Main reason for even thinking of this is that it seems you’d have to load up the HubDB table (the one linked as the dynamic data table) with lots of columns as you want more and more information to be dynamic
you could certainly make additional queries to other tables if you want
